snippet: Michael Blake, a Bronx Democrat who was criticized for accepting a job at a political consulting firm while retaining his seat in the New York Legislature, said on Sunday evening that he would not take the position.
abstract: New York State Assemblyman Michael Blake announces that he will not take position at Hilltop Public Solutions political consulting firm; statement comes after Blake was criticized for accepting job while keeping his seat in Legislature.
lead_paragraph: Michael Blake, a Bronx Democrat who was criticized for accepting a job at a political consulting firm while retaining his seat in the New York Legislature, said on Sunday evening that he would not take the position.

headline.main: Facing Criticism, Assemblyman Says He Is Declining Consulting Job
headline.print_headline: Facing Criticism, Assemblyman Says He Is Declining Outside Job
